name: ohmytoken-tracker
tagline: Watch your tokens burn, one bead at a time
description: ohmytoken-tracker automatically reports every LLM token consumed through your OpenClaw gateway to ohmytoken.dev, where your usage is visualized as a colorful pixel bead board in real-time. See which models you use most, track daily/total spending, unlock achievements, and share your unique bead art with the community.
